events.description: Order changes relating to a token pair
Order changes related to an account address
Notifications related to an account address
State changes to FillReceipts associated with orders created by maker
State changes to FillReceipts filled by taker
State changes to FillReceipts belong to a certain asset pair

Order.description: An order that has been recorded on the ERC dEX Order Book

dateClosed.description: Enables basic storage and retrieval of dates and times.

expirationTimeSeconds.description: Unix timestamp of order expiration (in seconds)

makerFee.description: Fee due from maker on order fill

makerAssetAddress.description: Token address of the maker token

makerAssetAmount.description: Total amount of maker token in order

signature.description: Serialized version of the EC signature for signed orders

takerAddress.description: Taker address; generally a null taker

takerFee.description: Fee due from taker on order fill

takerAssetAddress.description: Token address of the taker token

takerAssetAmount.description: Total amount of taker token in order

remainingFillableTakerAmount.description: Remaining amount that can be filled in taker tokens

remainingFillableMakerAmount.description: Remaining amount that can be filled in maker tokens

orderHash.description: The hash of the signed order

state.description:
State of the order: Open (0), Canceled (1),
Filled (2), Expired(3), Removed(4)

quoteId.description: Computed hash verifying the authenticity of the order

orderHash.description: Computed hash verifying the authenticity of the order

takerAmount.description: Taker amount in base units to fill from this order

dateUpdated.description: Enables basic storage and retrieval of dates and times.

takerAddress.description: Order taker

takerAmount.description: Total taker amount

takerAssetAddress.description: Address of taker token

feeTokenSymbol.description: Symbol of the token used to pay fees

feeAmount.description: Amount of fees paid in wei

networkFeeAmount.description: Amount of fees paid to cover network fees in wei

state.description: State of the quote (Open [0], Expired [1], Invalid [2], Redeemed [3])

feeOrderId.description: ID of order used to pay fees

dateUpdated.description: Enables basic storage and retrieval of dates and times.

Order.description: An order that has been recorded on the ERC dEX Order Book

dateClosed.description: Enables basic storage and retrieval of dates and times.

expirationTimeSeconds.description: Unix timestamp of order expiration (in seconds)

makerFee.description: Fee due from maker on order fill

makerAssetAddress.description: Token address of the maker token

makerAssetAmount.description: Total amount of maker token in order

signature.description: Serialized version of the EC signature for signed orders

takerAddress.description: Taker address; generally a null taker

takerFee.description: Fee due from taker on order fill

takerAssetAddress.description: Token address of the taker token

takerAssetAmount.description: Total amount of taker token in order

remainingFillableTakerAmount.description: Remaining amount that can be filled in taker tokens

remainingFillableMakerAmount.description: Remaining amount that can be filled in maker tokens

orderHash.description: The hash of the signed order

state.description:
State of the order: Open (0), Canceled (1),
Filled (2), Expired(3), Removed(4)
